pages.text: $(li)The Stone Pickaxe is the upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_pickaxe)Wooden Pickaxe$(/l).$(br)$(li)This pickaxe opens the possibility of mine new blocks as the Iron Ore and Lapis Lazuli Ore.

pages.name: Stone Pickaxe
pages.text: The Stone Pickaxe has more durability than the last one.
$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/toolsmith)Toolsmith$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by Stone Pickaxes.
